verses.roman:
āra yata vṛndāvane baise bhakta-gaṇa
śeṣa-līlā śunite sabāra haila mana

synonyms: āra yata—there are many others; vṛndāvane—in Vṛndāvana; baise—residents; bhakta-gaṇa—great devotees; śeṣa-līlā—the last portions of Caitanya Mahāprabhu's pastimes; śunite—to hear; sabāra—of everyone; haila—became; mana—the mind.
translation: In Vṛndāvana there were also many other great devotees, all of whom desired to hear the last pastimes of Lord Caitanya.
